user.title: Initial Setup
user.description:
Welcome to this integration!
This integration is designed to centralize and manage your AI entities.

**User Guide:**
All Home Assistant-certified conversation entities are supported.
You may add any of the three types of custom conversation entities as needed.


**Note:**
We do not create AI, nor increase system memory usage.
Future updates will also avoid adding any additional network connections.


If you're ready,

You can proceed to modify the integration name.
Once done, click submit to continue to the next step.
